31a6('bum): bu gang ji skad cig srid pa de dag thams cad dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dran gyi bya mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mthor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der drong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan
31a7('bum): 'odas kyi rnabs gnyis la skyobs phyag 'tshas te/ phyog so gcig tu khyod do// de nas rgyal po chebani dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gan
31a8('bum): gtsang mo'i ris kyi lhan rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shir phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshon nyid 'di mnga' ba/ dge slong 'bu 'byor ces byar
31b1('bum): sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
31b2('bum): pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongasu dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// lho dang / nub dang byang dang / byung shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / reg dang steng gi phyogs
31b3('bum): re re zhing sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' bri/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / 
31b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'dra nyid zhu zhing yongs dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// 
31b5('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang so'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang
31b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sten cing 'chad par 'gyu ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la de bzhin
31b7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba de dag kyang / sa phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ 
31b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang rtags gang dang mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
32a1('bum): chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid sten cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces
32a2('bum): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// 'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa
32a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bde zhes bya ba
32a4('bum): dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
32a5('bum): gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya ba
32a6('bum): 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
32a7('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par
32a8('bum): shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings
32b1('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
32b2('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
32b3('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi skrag ces bya bar chos ston
32b4('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar ches sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar
32b5('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// pha rol du phyin pa
32b6('bum): thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bodun rtog bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
32b7('bum): sum bcu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun badrag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs
32b8('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba'im/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos sbyin por mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ man zhes bya
33a1('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs
33a2('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden po rnams dang
33a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamos dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
33a4('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// 
33a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ badrag med ces bya ba 'i/ mngon par shes pa nas
33a6('bum): sdug bsngal ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chis ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
33a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ 
33a8('bum): da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 
33b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba'i/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya
33b2('bum): ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgra rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar ches ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings
33b3('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston
33b4('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
33b5('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ra'am/ sangs rgyas
33b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs skyug ces bya ba la mi sdug ces
33b7('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar ston par mi 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcing
33b8('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs 'das zhes bya ba la/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'o// da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ste/ 
34a1('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde
34a2('bum): zhes bya ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba laM/ mi sdug
34a3('bum): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba la/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos sten par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba'o/ 
34a4('bum): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyu ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba'i/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos sten par mi 'gyu ro// gsol pa bcom
34a5('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ches 'di ji ltar ston par 'gyur
34a6('bum): ston ni ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag gi/ zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyu ro// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
34a7('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag go// zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos sbyin par 'gyu ro// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin du rnam par dag go
34a8('bum): zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i ches ston par 'gyuraro// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun shin du rnam par dag go// zhes
34b1('bum): shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyu ro// ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 
34b2('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go
34b3('bum): zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyuraro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin du rnam par dag go// zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
34b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par
34b5('bum): 'gyu ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag go zhes/ shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyu ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa thams
34b6('bum): cad ni yongasu dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsgyel pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yong su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dge pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
34b7('bum): rnam par shes pa yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab
34b8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa tha yongs dag pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
35a1('bum): du phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / 
35a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu dag pa'i phyirartsashes rab
35a3('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
35a4('bum): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
35a5('bum): yongasu dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yong su dag pa'i phyir/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol
35a6('bum): du phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongasasu drag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag pa
35a7('bum): legs/ ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol du
35a8('bum): phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags
35b1('bum): ji ltaran 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas
35b2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yong su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
35b3('bum): pha rol du phyin pa yongs dag pA legs/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasu drag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag
35b4('bum): pa lagaso/ ji ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
35b5('bum): yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ 
35b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang
35b7('bum): kun nus nyon mongs po med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la
35b8('bum): skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang rje ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o// skye mched
36a1('bum): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang
36a2('bum): ba med pa ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa
36a3('bum): bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su
36a4('bum): dag po'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
36a5('bum): thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
36a6('bum): shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu
36a7('bum): dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye bo med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nos nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba/ 
36a8('bum): med pa ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
36b1('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs
36b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba rol skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
36b3('bum): phyi dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi nga
36b4('bum): rol du phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag po'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ 
36b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang po med pa'i phyir/ 
36b6('bum): nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
36b7('bum): ji ltar na/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa la gos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab
36b8('bum): 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med/ pa'i phyir/ shes rib kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyed med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
37a1('bum): rol du phyin pa yongasu drug pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
37a2('bum): pa yongs su dag po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsgyel pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sku ltar na mkha'i
37a3('bum): la tha rad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nu ma mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
37a4('bum): yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shi sa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dgra po lags/ 
37a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du medo/ rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyirashes rab kyi pha
37a6('bum): rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ 
37a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 
37a8('bum): rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du na mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// rab 'byor
37b1('bum): gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
37b2('bum): phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis
37b3('bum): pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rab 'byor ches thams cad shin du rnam par
37b4('bum): dag pa'i phyir/ shaus rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lA la zhig/ shes rab
37b5('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nod byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i
37b6('bum): nAd dang sna'i nang dang / lce'i nang dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro// rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur
37b7('bum): rigs kyi bu'im/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i slad du lU brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyu ro te
37b8('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi ber gi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin 'brang b.ra'i gyur ro// gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'om/ 
38a1('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang/ bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'dra bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang
38a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshang ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bas
38a3('bum): gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi
38a4('bum): bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di lta'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po
38a5('bum): mang bang tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
38a6('bum): 'di ni rin po che'o// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin du rin po che ni 'di min te/ sems can dmyal ba lus sgrol bar byed pa'o// byem song gi sgra gnas dang / gzhin rje 'jig rten dang mi dang snying dbum
38a7('bum): po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs tshe zhing mtho ba'i rigs su 'byin pa'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigasu 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su 'byin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i
38a8('bum): ris kyi lha'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir
38b1('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
38b2('bum): las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing me tho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho
38b3('bum): ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bco rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma deng draga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris
38b4('bum): dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dog dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge
38b5('bum): rgya sa dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// namakha' mtha'
38b6('bum): yos skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lnga rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i
38b7('bum): 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu'i yod do// 
38b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod na bsam gtan bzhi med do// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yod do// 
39a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang shes
39a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
39a3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting
39a4('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
39a5('bum): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ 
39a6('bum): de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing metho'i rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
39a7('bum): yod do/ sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs
39a8('bum): tshen dang snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang mi
39b1('bum): che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / nam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad
39b2('bum): med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
39b3('bum): bcom pa rnams dang / rang byang chub rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
39b4('bum): rgyas rnams yod do// de bas na de ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol du phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa'i ma kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam
39b5('bum): par byang ba 'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs
39b6('bum): su bzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do// rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 
39b7('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa 'am/ 'dus byas samo/ 'dus ma byas pa'i chos gang yang dmig su med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs
39b8('bum): su med de/ rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'gro po med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'gro ba gyur pa'i chos de lta bu ngamig su med de/ rab 'byor
40a1('bum): de'i phyir na/ pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba med pa'i pha rol du rin po che'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
40a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ 'di ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa s+ho/ shes
40a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa skem pa'i// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shipa sangs rgyas
40a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim 'gro dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yod
40a5('bum): su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni// 
40a6('bum): gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa 'am/ yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gag par byed pa 'am/ kun nas
40a7('bum): mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'ongal bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar byed pa med do// rab 'a
40a8('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'do' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'do' bar byed pa ma yin
40b1('bum): gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 
40b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgrub
40b3('bum): pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgru pa ma yin// 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs te/ 
40b4('bum): chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
40b5('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ 'drar ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
40b6('bum): bya rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgro rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sas
40b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pi 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin
40b8('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrib pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba mchin
41a1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa nyid sgrub ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus
41a2('bum): ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yong rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
41a3('bum): dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so// mngon par thugs su chud do// mngon par thugs su rgyung
41a4('bum): nas kyang gsung nga ston to// brjod de 'grol to// rnam par 'byed do/ gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par ston to// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ sbyang lhung rdzogs
41a5('bum): kyi sgra byung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang pun ta ri ka dang / man da ra ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad du tshig brjod par gyur to// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol
41a6('bum): du phyin pa stan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa 'i skor bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
41a7('bum): gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin
41a8('bum): no// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang chos gang 'khor ba 'om/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar len pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
41b1('bum): chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i slad du/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
41b2('bum): bstsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
41b3('bum): duphyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
41b4('bum): nyid kyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pas stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
41b5('bum): dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bas
41b6('bum): gtan rnams dang / tshang med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pachu dang/ stong pa
41b7('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / 
41b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
42a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus slong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong mi' ba'i
42a2('bum): 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / ring byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong de/ rnam pa thams cad
42a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dzin chen poste/ 'di ma
42a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// de chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
42a5('bum): byin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang
42a6('bum): bskor ba chos gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor bu'am/ rab tu 'khor bor bgyi ba ma mchis te/ de dag ni chos gang yang yong su mthong ba'am/ yong su ma mthong ba ma mchis so// de ci'i snod du zhen du ni
42a7('bum): 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi pa'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta dmigasu ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin du mngon par ma grub pa ni
42b1('bum): de ci'i slad du/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa la mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lag so// mtshan ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lag so// smon pa ma mchis pa
42b2('bum): ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa lag so// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stan pa dang / skrags pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rab tu rgod pa dang / bzhag pa dang / rnam par 'byed
42b3('bum): pa dang rnam par grol ba dang / ston pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag por snyan pa 'od ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yong su dge pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa snyan pa de yang su so
42b4('bum): kyang ma stan sus kyang ma bzung ste/ gang sus kyang ma stan sus kying ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa'o// gang sus kyang mngon du bgyis pa de ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa ma
42b5('bum): mchis te/ chos ston pa 'di ni gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / 
42b6('bum): shes rab bam po// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
42b7('bum): 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du
42b8('bum): phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
43a1('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
43a2('bum): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thub pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di
43a3('bum): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'drin na mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du chub med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'a
43a4('bum): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'drin brjod du ma mchis po'i pha rol du phyin pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rig pa dang rnam par spong pa dmig su med pa'i
43a5('bum): ro gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mong ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ tshor rab dang 'du shes dang
43a6('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol po bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
43a7('bum): sa bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cid gro slong pa'i sbyin no// stsol pa com ldan 'das 'din skye zhes ra kyi ma du na pa 'dzin ma 'bregs pa'i b.rom du phyin 'i// bcom ldan
43a8('bum): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad bzung du med pa'i byor ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom
43b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad byung zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 
43b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag po med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin
43b3('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ byed pa po dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsel ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du
43b4('bum): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis
43b5('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'angs 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
43b6('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs sa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab
43b7('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra nyan pa dang brjod pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sti shes
43b8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ me long gi rang bzhin dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
44a1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dri na sgeg tu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la skye
44a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
44a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
44a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha ril du phyin pa 'ang ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i phyir ro// gsel ba bAH
44a5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byung ba ma mi chis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rnam par byang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir
44a6('bum): ri gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyang rol du phyin pa 'di ni dmi gsum mtshos pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ gnas dmi ngas
44a7('bum): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 
44a8('bum): spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 
44b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
44b2('bum): mi g.yo ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings lo gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
44b3('bum): du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod tshogs dang bral ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad mnor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
44b4('bum): byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ kun nas sdang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o bsngal
44b5('bum): pa chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
44b6('bum): bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sto shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i
44b7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal pa/ 'dod chagaso dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhe
44b8('bum): sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
45a1('bum): 'di ni gti mug gi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
45a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i phyi rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
45a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsgyel pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// gsil ba
45a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med
45a5('bum): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal
45a6('bum): pa mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shi sA rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bstsal
45a7('bum): pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ mnyam pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// 
45a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi se las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol po bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
45b1('bum): rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
45b2('bum): 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis
45b3('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
45b4('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ na mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad lo chags pa med par gyur pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ang
45b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ mi rtag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol
45b6('bum): bra bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol du phyin po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol bar sbyor ba
45b7('bum): med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal
45b8('bum): pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin
46a1('bum): pA'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol phra bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan nyid ma
46a2('bum): mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
46a3('bum): ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ nang gi chos dmag su med pa'i phyiraro/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin+do dzin
46a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// grisol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po 'di ni phyin
46a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
46a6('bum): 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyis
46a7('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmig su ming ba'i 'byor ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
46a8('bum): rol du phyin pa 'din don dam pastong pa nyid kyi pa'i ma du phyin pa'o// com ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ don dem paslong ba nyid tshig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
46b1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 'dus stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab
46b2('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
46b3('bum): pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'di
46b4('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol
46b5('bum): pabacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'ang ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro
46b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnamig
46b7('bum): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigasum
46b8('bum): med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben
47a1('bum): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
47a2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan
47a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o
47a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyi dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo/ 
47a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
47a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / che ru bo dang / sems dang / chos dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// 
47a7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos
47a8('bum): dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal paHrdzu
47b1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ dbang po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
47b2('bum): stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
47b3('bum): stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis
47b4('bum): stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ laM gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'a
47b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du
47b6('bum): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
47b7('bum): rol du phyin pa 'di ni// mtshan ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
47b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
48a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bac+doMs/ 
48a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
48a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gastsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
48a4('bum): pra/ sbyin pa dang ser sna dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcwo ldan 'das
48a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i
48a6('bum): pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
48a7('bum): 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi skye bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
48a8('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ bsamo gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das 'di/ 
48b1('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang shes rab 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs med pa'i phyiraro// gsol
48b2('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ 
48b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ laM gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum
48b4('bum): pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
48b5('bum): pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i phyir// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
48b6('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ches las yang dag por 'das pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ 
48b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
48b8('bum): kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ rang byung gi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos tha~Md dbang du sgyur ba'i
49a1('bum): phyir ro// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
49a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
49a3('bum): byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo grong gi nIl du grags pa de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal bi la bai rin bkur byas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
49a4('bum): du phyin pa 'di ni/ sems can gang gi rnal du grags pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sems can gang gi rnal du grags pa
49a5('bum): de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongasu bzung ba'o// gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bzung ba dang bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / 
49a6('bum): kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs
49a7('bum): mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gau shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongasu dris so// yongs zhuso// rigs kyi bu dang rig/ 
49a8('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la/ 
49b1('bum): byed pa de dag gis ni skal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims dang bzod du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyi dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi phra
49b2('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha rau da ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
49b3('bum): pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi
49b4('bum): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar bzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ sngon pha rol du
49b5('bum): phyin pa 'di thos nas kyang mos pa bgyid par mi nuso// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spang bar sems pa de dag gis ni sngon gyi me
49b6('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di spang bar gyur te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang / 
49b7('bum): mos pa mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos nas la bsnyen bkur bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i
49b8('bum): rol du phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes
50a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
50a2('bum): ni ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i laM yan
50a3('bum): lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs dang / rnam par
50a4('bum): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar sgoms par bgyi
50a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sa
50a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ji ltar sgom par bgyi/ zhes yongasu zhus yongs driso// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun
50a7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di snyan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po mos
50a8('bum): par mi 'gyur/ ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 
50b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su bcu rtsa
50b2('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bas gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
50b3('bum): mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa/ smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang / gzungs kyi sku
50b4('bum): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thad
50b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de/ 
50b6('bum): ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// 
50b7('bum): ke'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rnam tha~Mng mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi kau 'di las byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcwa
50b8('bum): rnams kyi rna ba thas cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brjod do// ke'u shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i
51a1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// laM gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes sgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi 'tshams sbyor
51a2('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad slong bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sos can na
51a3('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rked par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la rgod par
51a4('bum): 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnaMs rgyun du// 
51a5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras pa la rgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa la dgod par 'dod pa'i rig
51a6('bum): kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lnga brtson par bya'o// khams gsum du phul du phyin 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sa
51a7('bum): brtson par bya'o// bded bzhi 'gram par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun sdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi
51a8('bum): bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
51b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bas gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod
51b2('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po
51b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin po'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtson por bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
51b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lagaso/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa la/ 
51b5('bum): ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phas
51b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan nas dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rdi bar pa thar pargyud dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i skyes pa
51b7('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnaMs la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ting 'dzin nas dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson
51b8('bum): bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
52a1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
52a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa leg so leg so// ke'u shi ka khyod kyis smras pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis 'byung ngo // ke'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
52a3('bum): ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshor ba dang 'du shes
52a4('bum): drang 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rno bar shes pa la brtson par byed do// mig la mi gnas te gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i
52a5('bum): mig le brtson par byed pa yin no// rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid la mi gnas te gang gi tshe yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed pa yin no// gzugs la mi gnas te gang gi tshe
52a6('bum): gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos la mi gnas pa gang gi tshe// chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la brtson par byed pa yin no/ 
52a7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la/ 
52a8('bum): mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus
52b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba la brtson par byed pa yin no// sa'i khams la mi gnas te gang gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// chu'i khros dang me'i khaMs dang
52b2('bum): rlung gi khas dang na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rna par shes pa'i khas la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rna bar shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// / 
52b3('bum): me rig pa la mi gnas te gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'du byed dang rna bar shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang / rig pa dang tshe rab
52b4('bum): ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi gnas te gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te gang gi tshe
52b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
52b6('bum): rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
52b7('bum): la brtson par byed pa yin no// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
52b8('bum): la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par byed pa yino// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas la/ 
53a1('bum): mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pardas la brtson par byed pa yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nas da
53a2('bum): dbang po rnas dang stobs rnas dang byang chub kyi yan lag nas dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i
53a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs dang bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ 
53a4('bum): grang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar
53a5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nas la brtson
53a6('bum): par byed pa yin no// stong pa nyid dang mtshan mi med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnas la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnas la brtson par byed pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
53a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnas la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs la brtson par byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa/ 
53a8('bum): bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
53b1('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra btso ba nyid dang rang byang chub la migam
53b2('bum): te gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang byang chub la brtson par byed pa yin no// laM gi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshon pa thams cad
53b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya
53b4('bum): ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmig so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmig so// gang la gnas par bya
53b5('bum): ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmig so// gang la nga gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba'i de lta bu'i pha rol du
53b6('bum): phyin pa thad dang / stong pa nyid thad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi dmig so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / 
53b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnas dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
53b8('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnaMs mi dmig so// tingange 'dzin nas dang / gzugs kyi sgo nas mi dmig so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa
54a1('bum): bzhi dang / so yang dag par rig pa pa ni dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / 
54a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bco pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi dmig so// laM gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi de mig so// 
54a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi sbyor mi byed de/ gang gi tshe/ gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe
54a4('bum): gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes pa la mi sbyar mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe/ rna bar shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rna bar shes pa
54a5('bum): la brtson par byed pa yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi skyer mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rten cing / 
54a6('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa yin no// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thaMd dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe/ 
54a7('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang
54a8('bum): bas gtan rnams dang / tshad med po rnaMs dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnaM bar thar pa brgya dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang / stong pa/ 
54b1('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa
54b2('bum): rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// tinge 'dzin rnas dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo
54b3('bum): rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag par rog pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sang
54b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
54b5('bum): brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thad
54b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyar mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
54b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// gzugs dbus su mi dmig so// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang
54b8('bum): 'du byed dang rna bar shes pa sngon gyis mthar mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmig so// skye mched dang / khams dang // 
55a1('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dbus su mi dmig so// pha rol tu
55a2('bum): phyin pa thad dang / stong pa nyid thad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sprin gyi mthar mi dmigaso// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dra mi/ 
55a3('bum): so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmig so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa
55a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par/ 
55a5('bum): shes par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmig so// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
55a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// gzungs kyi sgo nas phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus mi dmig so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
55a7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// sangs rgyas/ 
55a8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbus su mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi mtha ni/ 
55b1('bum): dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmig so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rmad ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das
55b2('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra da ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes
55b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// shA ra dwa ti'i bu tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo// sha ra dwa ti'i
55b4('bum): ba skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / 
55b5('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
55b6('bum): meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam por thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par
55b7('bum): shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / rnams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dun
55b8('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
56a1('bum): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gting dpag // 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
56a2('bum): pa/ shwa ra ti'i bu gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka le/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'od byed dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes
56a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gting dpag dkalpA/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o// pha rol du phyin pa
56a4('bum): dang / stong pa nyid tha~Md dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sam bcu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bas gtan dang
