172b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bab mo 'od la rtag par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
173a1('bum): pa nyid la gnas pa'i bsamangs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go/ gas rab kyi rol du phyin pa pang mo 'di la rtag pa lags/ banam ldan 'das kyis bka' ba
173a2('bum): ga rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dri la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang / 
173a3('bum): smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
173a4('bum): pir byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsom pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhos
173a5('bum): ba'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
173a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po zab mo 'di la rtog pa ma yin/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig sgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / skul
173a7('bum): ba la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// // bam po bcu gcig pa// 
173a8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur
173b1('bum): ning nga mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byung ba ma mchis
173b2('bum): pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa'i nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pas
173b3('bum): gzugs brnyan dang / sgra bsnyen dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du ga phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub seMs
173b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la/ te rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten
173b5('bum): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
173b6('bum): dang / bsam gta na rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
173b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshe
173b8('bum): ba'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags so// 
175a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsu la pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog/ 
175a2('bum): pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no// pha rol du phyin pa thams
175a3('bum): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzu
175a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
175a5('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
175a6('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa
175a7('bum): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par bya ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / phyogs na yang
175a8('bum): mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs so// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i/ 
175b1('bum): ni/ gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor ba da / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten
175b2('bum): cing 'brel bapar 'byung bas ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khyims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
175b3('bum): gri pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas mi yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyis bar gyis me yin no// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams/ 
175b4('bum): kyis ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byangachub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
175b5('bum): lag brgyad pas ma yin no// rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam baM thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba dang 'du shes
175b6('bum): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
175b7('bum): 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshorab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
175b8('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa dzad byed ci kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
177a1('bum): sgyid kyi pa zhin nyid dang me bdod du bani na ga gags nyid gcig pa'o// rom du phyin pa thams cad kyid pa nidang gang yin pa dang / snang pa nyid thams cad kyi ba ni cing gang yin pa dang / nga
177a2('bum): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang min pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bosam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam
177a3('bum): bar thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
177a4('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 
177a5('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
177a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// // le'u sum bcu bdun pa'o// 
177a7('bum): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tshan dan gi bye ma dang / lce rdzas kyi me tog u nga la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka ming po dang / khyer de/ bcom
177a8('bum): ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su 'thor bar gyur to// gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na dor dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig du 'khod do// 
177b1('bum): 'khod nas 'dod pan spyod pa'i dang / gzugs yong pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ yang dag
177b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshorang
177b3('bum): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
177b4('bum): ba nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
177b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan ni
177b6('bum): byaram du byin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa'o/ nang dang banyid rnam pa thams cad ban
177b7('bum): bste/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nid stong pa nyid do// dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ nor pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos pa meng
177b8('bum): nga nyid stong pa nyidad// dran pa nye bar bdag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nyeb ba nag pal// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gnams
178a1('bum): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
178a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
178a3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
178a4('bum): pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / da gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs da pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa
178a5('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// 
178a6('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du
178a7('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa di bzhin nyid glang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sku
178a8('bum): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig po ste/ gnyis su
178b1('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
178b2('bum): gnyis su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
178b3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
178b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
178b5('bum): kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'i ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar
178b6('bum): gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba
178b7('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
178b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
179a1('bum): par 'jug pa'i di bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
179a2('bum): do// rnam pa thams cad/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par tha'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 
179a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres/ 
179a4('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig// pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// rgyun
179a5('bum): du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i'abras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'/ 
179a6('bum): dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// zhes
179a7('bum): ston pa de ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing rtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma
179a8('bum): lags pa ste/ ni ning phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs par rig par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs na
179b1('bum): yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
179b2('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched
179b3('bum): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thos
179b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / sbyin pa'i pha pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
179b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes
179b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thas
179b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
179b8('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
180a1('bum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sems
180a2('bum): bar 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
180a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
180a4('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang // snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
180a5('bum): kyi chochos ma 'dres pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
180a6('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
180a7('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byer med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
180a8('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
180b1('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa s+ho// gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ tshul khrims gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin po dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gang
180b2('bum): gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su med cing gnyis
180b3('bum): byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 
180b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig po ste/ gnyis su
180b5('bum): med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
180b6('bum): gnyi su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin
180b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / 
180b8('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med
181a1('bum): cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
181a2('bum): shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
181a3('bum): ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs
181a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de
181a5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu dag don
181a6('bum): gidabang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol ste/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
181a7('bum): kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing lnga dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing rtag tu med la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ naM ning phra ba ning mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi
181a8('bum): yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas ste/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos
181b1('bum): rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab po// lce'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
181b2('bum): po// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas su med pa zlab pa'i phyir chos
181b3('bum): 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mi skye ba'i mi 'gag pa dang mngon par rdzogs par 'byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
181b4('bum): bo// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 
181b5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso
181b6('bum): dang / skyes bu dang / gang thog dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tsher ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab
181b7('bum): pa'i byor chos 'di zab po// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
181b8('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag smin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
182a1('bum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
182a2('bum): zab po// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab po'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
182a3('bum): gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
182a4('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lce'ibu dag rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
182a5('bum): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin
182a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i
182a7('bum): bu dag rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu rnams kyis
182a8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis/ yid tshos par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni du/ gzugs bzung ba'i srad du sun
182b1('bum): pa lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ pha rol du phyin pa thams
182b2('bum): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
182b3('bum): pa dang tu rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 
182b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
182b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bzung ba'i slad du snyan pa me lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / de
182b6('bum): chos zab mo 'di ni rgyun du bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu bzung ba'i slad du snyan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bca
182b7('bum): pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gi rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig
182b8('bum): rten na bdag gi gzugs so// bdag ni gzugs can no// bdag ni tshor ba'o// bdag gis tshor bar bya'o// bdag ni 'du shes can no// bdag gi 'du byed do// bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o// bdagi
183a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'o// bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o// bdag gi skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// bdag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos can/ 
183a2('bum): bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa'o// 
183a3('bum): bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa// / yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag
183a4('bum): gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi bsam gautan gi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis
183a5('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// / 
183a6('bum): bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar ro// bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
183a7('bum): goms par bya'o// bdag gi dran pa nye bar bzhig pa'o// bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gri rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / 
183a8('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o// bde ga gi 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
183b1('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
183b2('bum): ma med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgra dang / bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo dang / la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
183b3('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba la spyad par bya'o// bdag
183b4('bum): gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni rgyu na du bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bdag gi lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bros 'gyuro// 
183b5('bum): bad ga gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni byu mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag gi dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// bdag gi rang byedang chu ba'o// 
183b6('bum): bdag ni rang byang chub/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdug gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da// bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod de// jici ldan
183b7('bum): 'das kyis bka'i bstsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de bzhi dag/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs bzung ba'i phyir bston pa ma yin// mi bzung ba'i phyir ma min/ tsha ba dang / 'du na
183b8('bum): dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung po zung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ 
185a1('bum): mi bzung ba'i phyir ma yin no// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong ba nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ 
185a2('bum): mi bzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
185a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / 
185a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byas pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
185a5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ ma bzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir ma
185a6('bum): yin/ lha'i bu dag gang yang gzugs bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod
185a7('bum): pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bzung ba'i phyir/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
185a8('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 
185b1('bum): rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyad pa dang / mngon par shes
185b2('bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
185b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi bzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis
185b4('bum): ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bsgom par mi nuso// / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam
185b5('bum): gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pho ro la du phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// nang stong pa nyid sgom par mi nus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do stong pa nyid kyi bar du
185b6('bum): bsgom par mi nus so// dran pa nye bar ba nag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
185b7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'a'ags pa'i lam yan lag bskyed pa pasgom par mi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mi khyen pa tshad kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so// de ras mi dang ldan par sa byo
185b8('bum): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'diskad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams 'dini chos thams cad dang / rjes su mthun pa ste/ chos 'din chos gang rnams dang / rjes su mthun
186a1('bum): pa lags shing / chos 'dri ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ba
186a2('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni dngos po
186a3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar dang / rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni dran po nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams
186a4('bum): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad / pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i
186a5('bum): bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
186a6('bum): ba dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
186a7('bum): dang de banan ga shegs pa'i skyobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / seM sa yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams bachen pa rangs rgyas kyi chos pa'i dris pa rna ma na
186a8('bum): rjes su mthun pa'o/ cha 'don rnam pams cad ma byen pa nad kyi pa dang / rjes su mthun pa la/ chos 'dinanam pa gang la yang bags pa sa bcos sa/ kyi khrigs pas
186b1('bum): zhe na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sa
186b2('bum): pa ma mchis so// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid tham cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la thogs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 
186b3('bum): bsam gtan dang / tshad me de pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
186b4('bum): mA med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa mchi so// mngon par rishes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzung kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang
186b5('bum): mi 'a'ajigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so// / 
186b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thugs pa ma mchis so// chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid dang / yang
186b7('bum): dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis
186b8('bum): ba dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// chos
187a1('bum): 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten ci
187a2('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 
187a3('bum): pa'i badren pa dang / bsam gtanaHdang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
187a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
187a5('bum): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam
187a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i srad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// chos 'drin gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
187a7('bum): shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang sgo mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rte mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang srung ba nyid thams cad dab dru
187a8('bum): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu co bdun garten mi dmigs pa dang 'phags pa'i bdon pa dang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pado / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa
187b1('bum): rnam par thar pa rgyud dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gzha
187b2('bum): pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gi rten mi dmigs pa dang
187b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gi bar gi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis so// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan
187b4('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas rten rab 'byor ni cing
187b5('bum): ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid la rtsams shing ston to// mtshan ma mchis pa dang smon pa mchis pa nyid rtsams shing ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
187b6('bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lce'i bu de dge la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag dang gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas rtan rab 'byor 'do ni de bzhin gshen
187b7('bum): ba rjes su smras su rnas zer bani du rjes su skyes pas / gnas bdun 'byudu bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes sa skyes pa phyir nen/ gnas pad pa gyu du / 
187b8('bum): ba tso kyi sas rgyasas rgyas pa / m-i nga ni gshegs pa ni gagag 'dzidzin gyi yang ban du gnas pa
188a1('bum): nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song bas na/ thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad
188a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin no// 
188a3('bum): de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas/ de bzhin gshegs
188a4('bum): pa'i rjes su byas so// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kyang
188a5('bum): 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de
188a6('bum): bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ci lal
188a7('bum): thogs pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig cing gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
188a8('bum): med la de bzhin nyid de yang ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba yang med de de bzhin nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa'ang med pa'i de phyir de bzhin nyid ni gnyis
188b1('bum): su med cing gnyis su byur med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ning bzhin gzugs pa'i rjes su smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de banin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cang du
188b2('bum): 'gyur ba med cing rnam pa thams cad du rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnoso brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med cing ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
188b3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad ba dbyer med pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad ba dbyer med pa 'byed pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa skye
188b4('bum): ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te de ni
188b5('bum): yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing rtag tu de bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang med ba dang rnam par bzhan pa yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
188b6('bum): rjes su skyes kyang rjes su skyes pa med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtanA rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes bya ba ste/ 'das pa'i
188b7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa snod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid do// ma
188b8('bum): 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhi nyid kyi mnya
189a1('bum): pa nyid do// de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis da ltar
189a2('bum): byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de ltar na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// gzugs
189a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa nyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin
189a4('bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i di bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba/ dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis
189a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs
189a6('bum): nga'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gtso/ 
189a7('bum): pa 'di bzhin nyid kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di bzhin nyid de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de las gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
189a8('bum): med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na sbyin
189b1('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
189b2('bum): pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol du phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshe
189b3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de// de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su bya
189b4('bum): med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid gi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi
189b5('bum): de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la sde gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// dngosapo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
189b6('bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi bar gi de bzhin
189b7('bum): nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do de bzhin gshegs/ 
189b8('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar ni dron pa nye bar banag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis
191a1('bum): byar med do// yang dag par spong ba dag rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
191a2('bum): yan lag rgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i di be ni na nyi dado// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yin lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na 'am
191a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / 
191a4('bum): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pargyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
191a5('bum): ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ mngon par shes pa
191a6('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams pa
191a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
191a8('bum): kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bzhin nyid de de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres/ 
191b1('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshes
191b2('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de
191b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 'di ni rab 'byor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191b4('bum): pos// de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i// ming thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gi
191b5('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos te/ g.yos so rab du g.yos so// kun du rab tu g.yos so// 'gul to rab du 'gul te// kun du 'gul to// ldeg
191b6('bum): gau rab du ldeg go// kun du ldeg go// chem che ma rab tu chem tshe me/ kun du chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur rab tu'u re'u raM/ kun du 'u re'ur ro// shig shig rab tu shig shig/ kun du rab tu shig shig/ 
191b7('bum): shar phyogs mtho nani nub phyogs dma'/ shar phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho// byang phyogs mtho' ni ni lho phyogs dma'o// byang phyogs dma' na ni lho phyogs mtho'i// dbus mtho' na ni
191b8('bum): mtha' dma'// dbus dma' na ni mtha' mtho bor gyur to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor/ 
192a1('bum): lA l+yA rdzas kyi rgyan dan gyi bye mas/ gtor mngon par gtor/ rab tu gtor nas/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor 'dridi de bzhin gshegs pa
192a2('bum): de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to// zhes tshig tu brjod do// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i bu de dag gi gta mo de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste/ 
192a3('bum): lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar lha'i bu dag gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ gzugs ni rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// gzugs kyi de bzhin
192a4('bum): nyid kyang rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam
192a5('bum): par shes pa las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa ra shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// / 
192a6('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rjes su ma skyes so// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin
192a7('bum): nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi
192a8('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
192b1('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs
192b2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rjes su ma skyes sangs
192b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
192b4('bum): bzhi ni nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 
192b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes
192b6('bum): 'dus byas la gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus ma byas kyi rjes
192b7('bum): su mo skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gno na gi rjes su me skyes so// 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// de ci'i
192b8('bum): phyir ne na/ de ni 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang / gang gis mngon par rjes su skyes pa dang / gang rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang rjes su skye bor 'gyur ba 'am/ 
193a1('bum): gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da tI'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
193a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang // me nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa
193a3('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi dmyigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs ste/ gzugs kyi nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmi/ 
193a4('bum): pA ra ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i di bzhin nyid mi dmigs ste/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang / 
193a5('bum): mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs/ rten cing 'brel bar
193a6('bum): 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nyid kyang mi dmigs ma rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa ra ga la gyur/ pha rol du phyin pa thos
193a7('bum): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
193a8('bum): ba dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong po nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi/ 
193b1('bum): sgro dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
193b2('bum): 'dres pa 'dri bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad
193b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams
193b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsalnga pa/ da sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid
193b5('bum): 'di ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi dmigs/ gzukyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang mi dmiHna/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ 
193b6('bum): de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i
193b7('bum): de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmyigs te/ rten cing 'brel
193b8('bum): ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
194a1('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
194a2('bum): chos kyi de bzhin nyid la dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thos
194a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid blta ba dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
194a4('bum): pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi
194a5('bum): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob po// byang chub sems dpa' yongs
194a6('bum): sunyam pa'i chos can drug bcu ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas lnga brgya
194a7('bum): basbyin bkur te/ thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims srungs/ bzod pa sgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams// bsam gtan bsgrubs/ shes rab bsgoms kyang / de dag shes rab kyi pha rom
194a8('bum): du phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas/ sbyin pa byin de 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o// 'di la sbyin par mi bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims
194b1('bum): bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag gis bsgom par bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag gis rtsam par bya'o// 'di ni bsam gtan no// bdag gis ni mnyam par
194b2('bum): bzhag par bya'o// 'di ni shes rab po/ bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o zhes tha mi dad par spyad pas/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bar sbyin pa
194b3('bum): gtong / tshul khrims srungs/ bzod pa sgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog/ shes rab la goms par byed cing / de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas/ tho mi
194b4('bum): dad pa la dmigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
194b5('bum): dgra bcom pa'i nyid kyi bar du thob po// sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod
194b6('bum): mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas/ yongs su ma bzung / yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du ma byas nas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// 
194b7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / sman pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du 'dra yang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing
194b8('bum): thabs mkhas pa dang / bral ba rnams ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas/ yongs su
195a1('bum): bzung ba dag ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa sa chos de dag nyid la bsgom du bas kyang / thabs mkhas pa la rten cing bla na medad pa yang dag
195a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sha ra da ti'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
195a3('bum): dang bral ba ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos 'ba' shig sgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa thob pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
195a4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba/ rnams ni stong pa// dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams
195a5('bum): la bsgom zhing thabs mkhas pa thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon mod par 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
195a6('bum): rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bye zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am/ dpag chad ba ni brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad
195a7('bum): lnga brgya pa zhig yod pa des sum bcu rtsa gsum gi wA'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la/ bya de la yang 'dab ma med pa nig ste/ de 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas so snyam nas/ sum bcu rtsa
195a8('bum): gsum gi lha'i ris nas/ bdag nyid mtshangs te gal te bya des/ lam nas/ ga re bdag gis phyir sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i bu ris su gnas par bya'o// snyam du bsams ni/ shi ra da/ 
195b1('bum): 'dus smra du skyems/ byung bying sus bcu gsus kyis ris su gnas parnyan smras ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam sags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' bsngam
195b2('bum): ge gas te mem nis 'di snyam du mos bdag gis ci des kyang ma smad par 'jam pa'i gling du 'dug par bya'osnyam ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bude la jisnyam du sems/ bya 'dzam bu'i gling dum
195b3('bum): smas ma snad par 'dug par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das do ni 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung bste/ smras pa 'am smad par yang 'gyur/ 'gul ba 'am
195b4('bum): 'gum bI la thug par/ sdug bsngal bar yung 'gyur ro/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lus che la 'dab ma mchis bi de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
195b5('bum): des sa kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims
195b6('bum): srung / bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus brtsom/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyin
195b7('bum): de'i smon pa yang che/ de'i sems bskyed pa yang che/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang tshad med du zin kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas/ yongs su ma bzung na/ nyan
195b8('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi ldan par sbyin pa
197a1('bum): byin/ tshul khrims srungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la bsgrubs/ byang chub sems dpa' des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas
197a2('bum): yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem sa dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba di bzhin gshegs pa
197a3('bum): rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ sems shing 'dzin pa la mtshan mar byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa
197a4('bum): rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam gror grol ba'i ye shes gzi pa mi shes na/ de mi shis/ khong du ma chud pas/ stong
197a5('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / sgra thos nas/ de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par
197a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
197a7('bum): de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba ni/ de ltar du 'gyur du gdon mtho'o// shar
197a8('bum): da ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thog ma sems skyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar/ sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul
197b1('bum): khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ 'das
197b2('bum): pa dang / me 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam por grol ba dang / rnam par grolnga ba'i ye shes gzigs
197b3('bum): pa de la mtshan mar mi byed de de/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi'o dzon/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la/ mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ sman pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin
197b4('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol sha ra da ti'i ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i
197b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung tshul khrims
197b6('bum): bsrungs kyang mtshan ma r-i me bzung / bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / brtson 'grus brtsamos kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag kyang mtshan mar
197b7('bum): ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha/ bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / tinge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par
197b8('bum): grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs kyang mtshan mar bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung
198a1('bum): // sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la ma
198a2('bum): bar gzhog pa dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong
198a3('bum): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
198a4('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
198a5('bum): byar 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / mngon pa shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi
198a6('bum): sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
198a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o// / 
198b1('bum): ldan 'das bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 
198b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/ de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
198b3('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ 
198b4('bum): gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ skye mched dam/ khams sam
198b5('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'am/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid rnams sam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnamaso sam/ 'phags pa'i bden
198b6('bum): pa 'am/ bsam gtan nam/ tshad med pa'am/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa 'am/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 
198b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin tam/ gzungs kyi sgo 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sam/ mi
198b8('bum): 'jigs pa 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa 'am/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba
199a1('bum): ram/ chos gang la yang dmigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'i gang shes rab kyi pha rol du
199a2('bum): phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsam ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
199a3('bum): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de deg gis/ sbyin pa ci dang ci btang ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang / de bzhin du tshul khrim
199a4('bum): gang dang gong bsrungs pa dang / bzod ci dang / ci bsgribs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang bas/ gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag pa dang shes
199a5('bum): zla ba gang dang gang la snyoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste/ bsgoms pas de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
199a6('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tsom ma mchis par rig par bgyi ba legs so// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a7('bum): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de nga thobs mkhas pa dang ma bral
199a8('bum): bar bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis/ mtshan ma med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa yongs su gtso/ 
199b1('bum): bar bgyi'o// tshul khrims srung bar bgyi'o// bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// brtsom 'grus brtsom par bgyi'o// bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog par bgyi'o// shes rab sgom
199b2('bum): par bgyi'o// nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o// yang dag par
199b3('bum): slong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / 
199b4('bum): gsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la spyad par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad dong / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
199b5('bum): ba dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / la spyad par bgyi'o// 
199b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyad par bgyi'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
199b7('bum): kyi bar la spyad par bgyi'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang
199b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyad la/ chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag
200a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag bla na med pa
200a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni'i byung bar dka'o// lha'i bu dag ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ don dam par na gang
200a3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya ba 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so// 
200a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// 
200a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o// zhes gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'gyis ji ltar gsungs
200a6('bum): ba'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / badreg sems pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar med/ 
200a7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis gang gis kyang mingangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang lnga mngon par rdzogs
200a8('bum): bar 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du ne na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni stong ba ste/ chos gang 'phel bar bgyi ba 'am/ yongs su
200b1('bum): 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i yongs su btang ba 'am/ tshul khrims srung ba dang laM bzod pa sgrub pa 'am/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa'am/ bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa
200b2('bum): 'am/ shes rab bsgom pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid sgom pa 'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/ yang
200b3('bum): dag par slong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
200b4('bum): bsgom pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bsgom pa 'am/ rnam pa them cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi don du bslab par bgyi ba'i chos
200b5('bum): de dag kyang ma mchis ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang gi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
200b6('bum): bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad kyang spyod pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni
200b7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'od byed dang / 
200b8('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gis stong
201a1('bum): po// pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin
201a2('bum): kyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par zir pa brgyad dang / mthor gyis
201a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / 
201a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
201a5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan/ 
201a6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
201a7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i
201a8('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'di snyam du bdag
201b1('bum): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha'
201b2('bum): dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sim sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
201b3('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par byed kyang / bla na med pa yang dge
201b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs dpar 'tshang rgya bar bya ba smra ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba med na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i
201b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub laso phyir ldog par yang ga mi 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ bla na med pa
201b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar ni dka' ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bsla ba ma yin par shes so// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 
201b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab sha ra dwa ti'o bi de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni mi yin no// smras
201b8('bum): pa 'o na ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// 
202a1('bum): smras pa na ci du ldan pa shAr da'i dri de'i sam dusams/ skye mched da / khams dang rten cing brel par byung bdag pa ma du sbyin pa rnams na dung/ snru
202a2('bum): nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'bogs pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ 
202a3('bum): pA dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
202a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshe pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / 
202a5('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/ 
202a6('bum): bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ 
202a7('bum): gzugs las gud na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa'o ni ci cher
202a8('bum): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las gde ne gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/ smras pa che
202b1('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang 'o na ci tshe skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams ca
202b2('bum): dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
202b3('bum): par thor pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnos pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin/ 
202b4('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang / dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
202b5('bum): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las gud na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ljin/ 
202b6('bum): pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs som/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras po che dang ldan pa dang 'phyo shi ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bani na nyid gang
202b7('bum): yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i di bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang
202b8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las skye mched dang // khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
